org.datavec.api.transform.transform

Class BaseColumnsMathOpTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.api.transform.transform.BaseColumnsMathOpTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ColumnOp, Transform
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoordinatesDistanceTransform, DoubleColumnsMathOpTransform, FloatColumnsMathOpTransform, IntegerColumnsMathOpTransform, LongColumnsMathOpTransform, NDArrayColumnsMathOpTransform

    public abstract class BaseColumnsMathOpTransform
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transform, ColumnOp
    Base class for multiple column math operations. For example myNewColumn = column1 + column2 + column3.
    Note: this transform adds a (derived) column (with the specified name) to the end

    Note: Certain operations have restrictions on the number of columns used as input
    Add: 2 or more (a+b+c+...)
    Subtract: exactly 2 (a-b)
    Multiply: 2 or more (a*b*c*...)
    Divide: exactly 2 (a/b)
    Modulus: exactly 2 (a%b)
    Other math ops (ReverseSubtract, ReverseDivide, ScalarMin, ScalarMax) are not allowed here.



    See: IntegerMathOpTransform, DoubleMathOpTransform, LongMathOpTransform for operations with a scalar + single column, instea

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
